channel.title: Home
channel.description: Linguistics and computer science research, projects, and writing.

item.title: Mijikenda Online Dictionary
item.description: Standardized picture dictionary of Mijikenda, built using the Online Living Dictionary platform.

item.title: Phoneme Perceptron
item.description: Neural network model to classify and predict phonemes in speech data.

item.title: Data-Constrained ASR Model
item.description: Automatic speech recognition for data-limited languages using data augmentation and multilingual models.

item.title: FDIC Data Analysis Pipeline
item.description: Large-scale financial data analysis for U.S. banking institutions.

item.title: Markov's Muse
item.description: Text generation tool using Markov chains for creative writing and inspiration.
